meanings.definition: A plant of the rose family with clusters of small white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The meadowsweet bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of meadowsweet for my mother.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the meadowsweet, enjoying its sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as lovely as a meadowsweet in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the meadowsweet danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A sweet-smelling herb used in herbal medicine and as a flavoring agent.
meanings.sent1: The meadowsweet added a pleasant aroma to the room.
meanings.sent2: She brewed a tea with meadowsweet to help soothe her sore throat.
meanings.sent3: The chef sprinkled meadowsweet into the soup, creating a delightful fragrance.
meanings.sent4: The scent of meadowsweet filled the air, bringing a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: As she inhaled the meadowsweet's fragrance, memories of childhood picnics flooded back.
